## For my final project, I would like to compare voting data in Eastern Europe with GDP per capita. I want to study the correlation between low voting/ low interest in democracy in areas that have struggled to transition from socialism to a capitalistic market system since the fall of the Soviet Union and its satellite states in the 1990s.
